name: Butterflies' Regent
description:
Controls

Use Up/Down, W/S to control your flight.

Collect butterflies to keep your speed up!

Credits

Jesterday - Modelling, Sound and Music (see misunra.com) for more 

Wellwick - Programming and "Art"

This was an experiment for the both of us. Jesterday learned some stuff about modelling for low poly models, and I did some in engine procedural gen. Each level is random, as well as each tree (although the vertex topology of the trees are super simple).
